message.content:
Rule Learning, Case Based. 

Rule Learning is present in the text as the paper proposes the development of a generic software tool that can be adjusted and extended incrementally based on the content of former layouts. This tool would use rules to formalize the know-how of architects and reuse it in new layouts. 

Case Based is also present in the text as the paper focuses on the indexing, retrieval, and reuse of former layouts, which can be seen as cases. The proposed tool would use these cases to learn and apply the know-how of architects in new layouts.
